sentences.en: And in some cases the counterfeit counterfeits cause tragic tragic problems of their own.
sentences.cn: 有时候假药就给他们造成了悲惨的问题.

sentences.en: And in some cases the counterfeits cause tragic problems of their own.
sentences.cn: 而有时候假药因本身的问题造成了悲剧.

sentences.en: Futhermore , if any more counterfeits are found, he may be trailed.
sentences.cn: 如果再次发现携带假冒伪劣产品, 将被依法起诉!

sentences.en: Levi Strauss says counterfeits of the company's jeans are flooding Europe.
sentences.cn: 利维·施特劳斯称仿冒其公司品牌的牛仔装正充斥着欧洲市场.

sentences.en: Like other counterfeits counterfeits, they look like real products.
sentences.cn: 同其它假冒品一样, 它们看起来就像真的产品.

sentences.en: No fakes, no counterfeits, all is due to the great respect for intellectual properties.
sentences.cn: 因为知识产权在新加坡受到很高的尊重,所以没假货, 也没水货.

sentences.en: Objective : To identify Chinese traditional medicine Cortex Magnoliae Officinalis , its counterfeits and substitues.
sentences.cn: 目的: 鉴别中药材厚朴及其伪品、混淆品.

sentences.en: Objects and people looked like counterfeits of themselves.
sentences.cn: 各种人和事好象都给自己披上了伪装.

sentences.en: Ringing these books were shelves of lesser counterfeits that altered a word or two.
sentences.cn: 环绕着这些书则摆着改了一两个字的次级赝品.

sentences.en: The counterfeits sell for about $20 less than the real thing.
sentences.cn: 赝品比真货便宜大约20美元。

sentences.en: The human brain detects such counterfeits easily.
sentences.cn: 人类大脑能够轻易地揭露这种赝品.

sentences.en: This ontological way of thinking is identical with Marxian ontological criticism of Hegel sego - consciousness counterfeits selfhood.
sentences.cn: 这种存在论思想方式,与当年马克思对黑格尔冒充自身的 自我 意识的存在批判是一致的.

sentences.en: We have seen many counterfeits, but we are born believers in great men.
sentences.cn: 我们见过许多骗子, 但是我们天生信赖伟人.

trans.tran_cn: 仿冒品（counterfeit的复数形式）；[法] 伪造品
仿制，造假( counterfeit的第三人称单数 )
